name: Spongebob Zombie Runner
description:
Get the HIGH SCORE on the game by collecting the pink jellyfish and get first access to an exclusive Spongebob Zombie music video. 

Mouse Left button = jump*

This is the first ever game I made! I have uploaded it so I can come back in the future and see where I came from (I hope I get better at game dev otherwise that's going to a bit embarrassing).

*do not push the space button!
